participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and caring, loves spending time with family and animals.
participant_1.background: I train my dogs and listen to death metal. I'm visiting my family for the first time in a long time and I'm really excited to see them! I like long walks on the beach. I just bought new hoop earrings. I often take my best friend to my grandmother's place for a visit.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and reflective, passionate about space and modeling.
participant_2.background: I am excited to study hard and reach my dream of becoming an astronaut. I used to work a 9 to 5 job as a telemarketer. I spent my summer nights at the coffee shop, watching the stars. I'm not sure how my parents died, but I'm sure they loved me very much. I'm a model and I want to look my best for my job.

content.text: I am doing good, just got back from the coffee shop, it was so nice outside! How are you?
I am doing great, I just got back from a walk on the beach.
Oh wow, that sounds lovely. I love the beach.
Me too, I love taking my dog for walks on the beach. What do you do for work?
I am a model, and I want to look my best for my job.
That's cool! I used to work as a telemarketer, but it was not for me.
Oh no, I can imagine that would not be fun.
Yeah, it was not. But now I am a dog trainer and I love it!
That's awesome! I am sure your dogs love you.
They do! I am so excited to see my family for the first time in a long time.
Oh wow, that must be really exciting! What are you most looking forward to?
I am looking forward to spending time with my grandmother. She is getting older and I want to make the most of it.
That is so sweet of you. I am sure she will love spending time with you too.
